data.actual_result: Random message from that DM appears in the middle of you screen and across multiple servers or DM's.
data.expected_result: Messages should stay as they were at the moment you opened Discord.
data.short_description: Through a series of steps, a sentence is glitched and appears in the middle of the screen (Not dupe, reproduction steps for unlisted bounty).
data.steps_to_repro: - iPhone X ONLY Method - Open Discord. - Go to a DM with a picture in it. - Open Keyboard and scroll to the picture. - Tap on the picture to enlarge it. - Rotate your phone and while the picture is rotating, tap the power button. - Unlock phone and it should open to Discord. Close the picture by swiping down on the top right. - A message should be in the middle of the screen and show up on other servers/DM's.
